title: Motion Systems Library
tagline: Reusable motion design systems for product launches, walkthroughs, and support content.

context.problem: Each product launch required bespoke animations, resulting in inconsistent pacing, voice, and asset management.
constraints: Multiple product teams with unique requirements
Support for both marketing and in-app education

solution.approach: Created a modular motion language with reusable components, flexible story structures, and a delivery pipeline that served marketing and product teams alike.

impact.label: Production Time
impact.description: Cut animation turnaround from 9 days to 4 days.

impact.label: Revisions
impact.description: Reduced feedback cycles thanks to shared storyboard language.

impact.label: Globalization
impact.description: Built-in localization support across motion deliverables.

process.title: Motion Principles
process.description: Developed brand motion principles and timing curves to establish consistent animation language

process.title: Asset Production
process.description: Built After Effects master files and converted key loops to Lottie for web and mobile integration

process.title: Export Automation
process.description: Automated exports with render queue presets for every channel—social, web, and in-app

process.title: Documentation & Training
process.description: Documented usage guidelines for design and marketing leads to ensure consistent application

reflection.learning: Motion systems should feel alive yet dependable—consistency comes from rules, not repetition.
